alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup; Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 10:14AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...ENHANCED FIRE DANGER IN KENTUCKY TODAY... Relative Humidity values will lower to between 28 to 35 percent through early this afternoon, before gradually recovering through early this evening. Light southwest winds will increase 8 to 12 mph, with gusts of around 20 mph this afternoon. This combination of gusty winds and lower relative humidity will bring an increased threat of wildfire activity today. THE FALL FIRE SEASON FOR KENTUCKY RUNS FROM OCTOBER 1ST THROUGH DECEMBER 15TH. DURING THIS TIME...IT IS ILLEGAL TO BURN ANYTHING WITHIN 150 FEET OF ANY WOODLAND OR BRUSHLAND BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 6 AM TO 6 PM. WARM...YET DRY CONDITIONS OFTEN EXPERIENCED DURING THE FALL MONTHS...COMBINED WITH ABUNDANT DRY LEAVES AND DEAD GRASSES...CREATE AN ELEVATED FIRE RISK. ALL BURNING BETWEEN THE HOURS OF 6 AM TO 6 PM DURING THE PERIOD OF OCTOBER 1ST THROUGH DECEMBER 15TH SHOULD BE AVOIDED. IN ADDITION...CAUTION SHOULD BE EXERCISED TO PREVENT FIRES...SUCH AS AVOIDING SMOKING OUTDOORS IN FIRE PRONE AREAS...TAKING CARE TO PREVENT SPARKS FROM EQUIPMENT OR MACHINERY FROM TRIGGERING FIRE STARTS...EDUCATING CHILDREN ABOUT THE DANGERS OF PLAYING WITH FIRE...AND ENSURING ALL LEGAL FIRES ARE PROPERLY SUPERVISED AND EXTINGUISHED. BURNING DURING WINDY CONDITIONS OR EXTREMELY DRY PERIODS SHOULD ALSO BE AVOIDED. FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ON KENTUCKY FIRE LAWS...CONTACT THE KENTUCKY STATE DEPARTMENT OF FORESTRY OR YOUR LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT.
